data.quote: It's okay not to be okay
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Being realistic is the most commonly traveled road to mediocrity.
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote: The first step is you have to say that you can
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote: Money and success don’t change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
data.author: Norman Vincent Peale

data.quote: If you can dream it - you can do it!
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star
data.author: Clement Stone

data.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
data.author: Michael Korda

data.quote: Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
data.author: Simone de Beauvoir

data.quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you’ll be successful.
data.author: Eric Thomas

data.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
data.author: Tim Notke

data.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
data.author: Ayn Rand

data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
data.author: thomas Jefferson

data.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says “I’m possible”!
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
